devTools.description: enable or disable dev tools tab in settings

fancyToolbar.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

language.description: language to use, if null the system locale is used

launcher.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

monitorsV2.description: list of monitors and their configurations

seelenweg.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

virtualDesktopStrategy.description: what virtual desktop implementation will be used, in case Native is not available we use Seelen

wall.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

windowManager.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

delayToHide.description: delay to hide the toolbar on Mouse Leave in milliseconds

delayToShow.description: delay to show the toolbar on Mouse Hover in milliseconds

dynamicColor.description: enable or disable dynamic color based on maximized focused window (themes can override this)

enabled.description: enable or disable the fancy toolbar

showHibernateButton.description: show the hibernate button on power menu

oneOf.description: auto-hide only if is overlaped by the focused window

tb.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

wall.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

weg.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

wm.description: @deprecated since v2.1.0, will be removed in v3.0.0

workspacesV2.description: list of settings by workspace on this monitor

MonitorSettingsByWidget.description: This struct is intented to work with ts-rs flattening

PluginId.description: Visual id composed of the creator username and the resource name. e.g. `@username/resource-name`

ResourceId.description: Visual id composed of the creator username and the resource name. e.g. `@username/resource-name`

delayToHide.description: delay to hide the toolbar on Mouse Leave in milliseconds

delayToShow.description: delay to show the toolbar on Mouse Hover in milliseconds

pinnedItemsVisibility.description: Determines is the pinned item should be shown or not (this can be overridden per monitor).

showEndTask.description: show end task button on context menu (needs developer mode enabled)

showInstanceCounter.description: enable or disable the instance counter visibility on weg instance

showWindowTitle.description: enable or disable the window title visibility for opened apps

temporalItemsVisibility.description: Which temporal items to show on the dock instance (this can be overridden per monitor)

thumbnailGenerationEnabled.description: Decides whether the application hoover should generate thumbnails or just list the names instead

SettingsByWidget.description: This struct is intented to work with ts-rs flattening

ThirdPartyWidgetSettings.description: This struct is intented to work with ts-rs flattening

$instances.description:
By intance will be used to store settings in case of multiple instances allowed on widget.\
 The map values will be merged with the root object and default values on settings declaration.

autoStackingByCategory.description: enable or disable auto stacking by category

enabled.description: enable or disable the window manager

resizeDelta.description: the resize size in % to be used when resizing via cli
